Items.Title: Oversight - DHS’ Procedures for Locating Transitional Housing for the Homeless.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - DHS’ Procedures for Locating Transitional Housing for the Homeless.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Department of Homeless Services to notify the affected community prior to locating transitional housing for the homeless.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Department of Homeless Services to notify the affected community prior to locating transitional housing for the homeless.

Items.Title: Oversight - DHS’ Procedures for Locating Transitional Housing for the Homeless.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - DHS’ Procedures for Locating Transitional Housing for the Homeless.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Department of Homeless Services to notify the affected community prior to locating transitional housing for the homeless.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Department of Homeless Services to notify the affected community prior to locating transitional housing for the homeless.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Koppell, Vacca and Vann
